altTitles.ja: きらぼしお嬢様の求婚

altTitles.ru: Предложение руки и сердца Кирабоши Оджо

altTitles.en: The Dazzling Young Lady's Marriage Proposal

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐ luō xīng dà xiǎojiě de qiúhūn

description.en:
One day, Yoshimi Numamoto suddenly receives a marriage proposal from a beautiful girl, when he doesn't even know her name. Apparently, she is a super-wealthy young lady. How can she she be so sure of herself? He can't help but feel embarrassed at the situation, but she remains insistent... and soon his school life will be turned upside down! 

The sparkling girl x plain boy super-darling love comedy begins!

(Source: Weekly Shonen Magazine, translated)
description.ja:
第1巻の内容紹介: 『男子高校生を養いたいお姉さんの話』『1年A組のモンスター』英貴、最新作！
超一軍女子×地味男子、プロポーズから始まるスクールカースト逆転ラブコメ開幕!!

ある日、名前も知らない女の子から突然のプロポーズを受けた沼本よしみ。彼女は三星光。富と権力を兼ね備えた超がつくお嬢様だった。よしみは戸惑いを隠せず、プロポーズを断ろうとする。だが、そこから彼女の権力を駆使した猛烈アプローチが始まる！…何故！？　理由はカンタン、三星光はよしみのことが大好きだから!! 1巻には描き下ろし番外編1話分収録！
 
---
 
Dai 1-kan no naiyō shōkai: “Danshi kōkōsei o yashinaitai onēsan no hanashi” “1-nen A-gumi no monsutā” Hidetaka, saishin-saku! Chō ichigun joshi × jimi danshi, puropōzu kara hajimaru sukūrukāsuto gyakuten rabukome kaimaku!! 

Aru Ni~Tsu, namae mo shiranai on'nanoko kara totsuzen no puropōzu o uketa Numoto Yoshimi. Kanojo wa Mitsuboshi hikari. Tomi to kenryoku o kanesonaeta chō ga tsuku ojōsamadatta. Yoshimi wa tomadoi o kakusezu, puropōzu o kotowarou to suru. Daga, soko kara kanojo no kenryoku o kushi shita mōretsu apurōchi ga hajimaru!… Naze!? Riyū wa kantan, Mitsuboshi hikari wa Yoshimi no koto ga daisukidakara!! 1-Kan ni wa kaki oroshi bangai-hen 1-wa-bun shūroku!

altTitles.ja: 時森さんが無防備です!!

altTitles.th: คุณโทคิโมริไม่ระวังตัวเลยครับ!!

description.en: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!
description.ja: 美人で仕事がデキる時森さん。でもオフのときは、ちょっとみだれがちで！？艶かしい時森さんとの同居生活に、僕はいつもドキドキさせられる—！！
description.pt-br: Tokimori-san é uma mulher linda e bem-sucedida. Mas quando ela está fora do trabalho, ela tende a ficar um pouco distraída! Viver junto com a charmosa Tokimori-san sempre me deixa nervoso!

title.en: Kusuriya no Hitorigoto ~Maomao no Koukyuu Nazotoki Techou~

altTitles.en: The Apothecary Diaries: Maomao's Rear Palace Mysteries Journal
The Apothecary Diaries: Maomao's Rear Palace Notebook of Mysteries

altTitles.ru: Монолог в аптечной лавке - Журнал тайн внутреннего дворца Маомао

altTitles.ja: 薬屋のひとりごと～猫猫の後宮謎解き手帳～

description.en:
In the imperial court, a young woman is put into servitude, Maomao. The tale is just beginning for the woman doctor/pharmacist from the red-light district, as rumors circulate about the emperor's children's lives being short-lived. Her curious nature and thirst for knowledge pushes her to action. To satisfy her curiosity, this young doctor/pharmacist will investigate the origin! What is shifting in the imperial court..!?  
  


---
description.ja: 誘拐された挙句、とある大国の後宮に売り飛ばされた薬屋の少女・猫猫（マオマオ）。年季が明けるまで大人しくしようと決めていた猫猫だったが、あるとき皇帝の子どもたちが次々と不審死することを知る。好奇心と少しばかりの正義心、そして薬屋の知識を使い、その謎を調べ始めてから猫猫の運命は大きく変わって…？
description.ru: В императорский двор была доставлена молодая девушка Маомао. История её берёт начало в районе красных фонарей, где начали ходить слухи о том, что жизни детей императора под угрозой. Ею движут любопытство и жажда знаний. Чтобы удовлетворить своё любопытство, молодая целительница будет докапываться до истины! Что же изменится при императорском дворе?!
description.pt-br: Na corte imperial, uma jovem é colocada em servidão, Maomao. A história está apenas começando para a médica/apotecária do distrito da luz vermelha, enquanto circulam rumores de que a vida dos filhos do imperador foi de curta duração. Sua natureza curiosa e sede de conhecimento a levam à ação. Para satisfazer a sua curiosidade, esta jovem médica/apotecária irá investigar a origem! O que está mudando na corte imperial..!?

altTitles.zh: 前女友成了我的顶头上司

description.en: The story of a girl who lives in a dark and quiet village. There is a gate in the village. "No children approached that gate," it was an unspoken rule. Until one day, the girl met someone who will change her fate.

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en:
An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

altTitles.ja: 義理チョコ嫌いの男女

altTitles.en: A Man and a Woman Who Hate Obligatory Chocolates

altTitles.pt-br: Um homem e uma mulher que odeiam chocolates obrigatórios

description.en:
"You realize that these aren't just obligatory chocolates, right?"

Obligatory chocolate is the kind that you give to people you don't even like, just because it's a Valentine's Day tradition. Aya, a beautiful office lady who is often misunderstood because of her lack of visible emotions, was complaining about it to her boss Takaki, as they walked to the train station together after work. However, Takaki told her, "That's too bad, because I was really looking forward to getting chocolates from Aya, even if it's just obligatory…"

As they parted ways, Aya hands Takaki a box of chocolates. Takaki is confused, because he thought she didn't like giving out obligatory chocolates…

"Senpai, are you really that dumb?"

Winner of the 3rd Toaru Nichijou Manga Award, it's a sweet romantic comedy that will satisfy your heart and your sweet tooth!
description.pt-br:
Você percebe que estes não são apenas chocolates obrigatórios, certo?

Aya, uma bela moça de escritório que costuma ser mal interpretada por causa de sua falta de emoções visíveis, estava reclamando disso com seu chefe Takaki, enquanto caminhavam juntos para a estação de trem depois do trabalho. No entanto, Takaki disse a ela: 

"Isso é uma pena, porque eu realmente estava ansioso para ganhar chocolates de Aya, mesmo que seja apenas obrigatório..."

Ao se despedirem, Aya entrega uma caixa de chocolates a Takaki. Takaki fica confuso, porque pensou que ela não gostava de dar chocolates obrigatórios...

"Senpai, você é realmente tão burro?"

title.en: Level 0 no Muno Tansaku Sha to Sagesumarete Mo Jitsuha Sekai Saikyodesu Tansaku Ranking 1 I Ha Nazo No Hito

altTitles.ja: レベル0の無能探索者と蔑まれても実は世界最強です
レベル0の無能探索者と蔑まれても実は世界最強です ～探索ランキング1位は謎の人～

altTitles.ja-ro: Level 0 no Muno Tansaku Sha to Sagesumarete Mo Jitsuha Sekai Saikyodesu Tansaku Ranking 1 I Ha Nazo No Hito

altTitles.en: The Despised Level 0 Incompetent Explorer Is Actually the World's Strongest
The Despised Level 0 Incompetent Explorer Is Actually the World's Strongest: The First Place in the Exploration Ranking Is a Mysterious Person

altTitles.es-la: Soy despreciado como el explorador de nivel 0 sin habilidades, pero en realidad soy el más fuerte del mundo

description.en:
The weakest me, partying with two of the most powerful girls!? 

After dungeons suddenly appeared on Earth, the concept of levels was inscribed on humanity. Levels were quantified, and as the law of the jungle became more and more prevalent, Level 0 Suzuki Hinata is the most discriminated against person in the world. 

Even though he's incompetent, he dreams of becoming a dungeon explorer, but for some reason Hinata suddenly becomes close to Kamui Hinata, a beautiful silver-haired girl with S-rank potential whom he meets at the high school he enrolls in?! 

"Could the identity of the number one explorer be...?"

altTitles.ja: 僕の彼女はデッカワイイ

altTitles.en: My Girl Friend Is Big & Cute!

altTitles.pt-br: Minha namorada é grande e fofa!

altTitles.en: My Girlfriend Is Big and Cute!

description.en:
For as long as he remembers, Komi has been shorter than his fellow classmates. He always felt inferior as a result, until he met Obinata - a girl who is head and shoulders above him. 

Yes, Asumi Obinata is tall. She’s imposing. But she’s also Komi Amane’s girlfriend. And these two are the happiest kids in the world. 

The super-popular oneshot has been expanded to a full series here!

altTitles.ja: デカいはちの話

description.en: What if bees were big and fluffy? Like, really big and fluffy.

Official Hetalia AU. "This world, although similar to the one we know of, is just slightly different. Data-wise, it's pretty much the same thing, just a lot more punk and grunge-like this time. 200 crowded districts, each with a unique culture and history of their own, each with a boss in charge, in a spinning circle of harmony and chaos. Yet a new disruption was about to arise."

altTitles.zh-hk: 事與願違的不死冒險者

altTitles.ja: 望まぬ不死の冒険者

description.en:
It's been ten years since Rentt Faina, a down-on-his luck Bronze-class adventurer, set his eyes on becoming Mithril-class. Unfortunately, Rentt finds himself helpless when confronted by a legendary Dragon in the Labyrinth of the Moon's Reflection...and is summarily eaten.

But Rentt has miraculously reawakened... as a skeleton?
description.ja:
最高位の神銀級冒険者を目指して十年。いまだ銅級冒険者のレントは、いつものように単独で《水月の迷宮》に潜り、鍛錬と日銭稼ぎをするつもり――だった。だが、初心者向けの迷宮にいるはずもない《龍》と遭遇。圧倒的な力の前に為す術なく喰われてしまう。

そして、死んだはずのレントは“目覚めた”――『骨人（スケルトン）』の姿で。

途方にくれたレントだったが魔物の持つ『存在進化』を用い人間を目指すことを決意。迷宮でひとり魔物へと挑み始める！
description.ru:
Однажды авантюрист медного ранга Рент наткнулся на неизвестный проход в лабиринте, и хоть всё говорило о том, что не стоит идти туда, парень всё же пошёл. На этом его жизнь закончилась . Но он не умер, а проснулся не человеком, а скелетом. И теперь всё, что он может — развиваться как нежить.

(Source: mangalib)
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um aventureiro da classe bronze, que mora em Malt, localizada na fronteira do Reino de Yaran. Por azar, se encontra com um poderoso monstro dentro do labirinto, e acaba sendo devorado. Quando recobrou a consciência ele percebe que se tornou um "Esqueleto". Não podendo falar e não podendo voltar para a cidade devido a sua condição atual, ele se lembra da existência da evolução existêncial, que nada mais é que o fato dos monstros poderem evoluir para outras formas derrotando oponentes. Com o objetivo de ganhar um corpo com carne, além de só ossos, ele vai começar sua épica jornada, eliminando tudo que ver pela frente...

altTitles.ja: 2.5次元の誘惑

altTitles.th: 2.5 มิติ ริริสะ

description.en:
From Seven Seas:
“I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura, the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.

English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)
description.ja: 現実の女に興味無し！俺の嫁・リリエルは2次元にあり！そんな漫研部長・奥村の前に現れたのは…リアルなリリエル？ドキドキコスプレコメディ開幕！
description.pt:
"Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu Liliel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu… uma Liliel real?  
Uma super comédia empolgante começa!
description.pt-br: "Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu, Liriel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu... uma Liriel real? Uma super comédia empolgante começa!

altTitles.ja: Kisu Shite Kurenakya Shinjau

altTitles.en: Your Kiss is the Only Medicine

altTitles.ja: キスしてくれなきゃ死んじゃう

description.en: Yuuta Sato accidentally discovers that childhood friend Rinko Uenohara contracted a very rare illness called the "Kissing Disease". The disease forces the person to kiss someone of the opposite sex at regular intervals or die! Yuuta decides that he is going to keep her alive no matter what. Will he succeed? What will the others think when they find out about the two!?

title.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death

description.en:
One day, an elementary school child named Yuuma tries to jump out of his classroom window. His classmate Hina stops him and, in a bid to stall for time, asks him, “Do you know the round of a hundred ghost stories?” Hina tells Yuuma about a ritual where, if you tell a hundred ghost stories, you’ll see ghosts afterward. Learning this gives Yuuma a new lease on life. Chapter by chapter, he shares ghost stories with the reader, slowly but surely inching his way toward one hundred…

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

altTitles.ja: ジャイアントキリング

description.en:
A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! 

---
Official Release:
- English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing)
- Indonesian release by Level Comics

---
- In 2010, this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.
description.pt-br: Giant Killing é um mangá que conta a história de um técnico de futebol, ex-jogador japonês, que luta para levar times amadores à vitória contra times campeões. Tatsumi Takeshi jogava profissionalmente no East Tokyo United, o ETU, e era louvado pelos torcedores por dar tudo de si e levar o time à vitória. Certo dia decide sair do Japão para treinar um time amador Europeu, e desde então é considerado “traidor” por alguns japoneses. Então, dois membros da equipe do ETU vão atrás do técnico para que ele treine o time onde um dia foi jogador, para tirar o time do fundo do poço.

description.en:
"I'll buy you and I'll pay more than anyone else!"
Lee Seol was a single ray of light when Haru lost his sight. After regaining his vision, Haru finds Seol again, but Seol has completely changed. Now, he is hosting wild parties at a mountain lodge, giving himself to men, and receiving sponsorships. Haru decides to become Seol's new sponsor.

The law is flawed and I'll be the one who will make it perfect. Blame the law that released you.  
  
Art done by the creator of [HIVE](https://www.webtoons.com/en/thriller/hive/list?title_no=65).
  
[Official Trad. Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/feifazhengyi/list?title_no=1434&page=1)  
 [Official Thai](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/vigilante/list?title_no=1488&page=1)
description.pt-br: A lei é falha e serei eu quem a tornará perfeita. Culpe a lei que te soltou.

altTitles.ja: 相続探偵

description.en: If there's people, there's inheritance. And if there's inheritance, there's trouble. At a prominent mystery novelist's funeral, a bitter "family feud" over his estate has begun. A videotape of the author's will shown at the site of the funeral has been like that first boxing bell of a fight, sounding the beginning of a merciless struggle between the author's three daughters and his secretary. Hot on the scent of this delectably shady case is a certain detective who goes by the name Nao Haie. Claiming to be a detective who specializes in any trouble having to do with inheritance and with a sense of smell like that of a hyena, Haie will blow the mysterious case of the author's will and the secrets it hides wide open!! A one-of-a-kind inheritance mystery begins now!!

title.en: Blue Archive - Kankan's Blue Archive Logs (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 透き通る世界

description.en: A collection of Blue Archive short comics by artist ポテトルス on pixiv.

altTitles.ja: 未確認で進行形　【みかくにんの村のおはなし】

description.es-la: Spin-off de "Mikakunin de Shinkoukei". Acerca de la vida cotidiana de los personajes en un universo paralelo donde Benio es la alcaldesa de la villa que todos habitan.

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.ja: めぐる未来

description.en:
Mirai, a man who does not show his emotions, lives happily with his innocent and cheerful wife Meguru, but he has a "cursed disease" that he keeps secret even from his wife.
Then one day, Mirai receives an important call from the police concerning his wife...!

title.en: Even Though I Transmigrated as a Villainess, I’d Rather Raise a Cat

altTitles.en: I Reincarnated as a Villainess, But Why Did I Become a Cat Butler Instead?
Even Though I Was Possessed as a Villain, I Still Want to Raise a Cat

description.en:
I transmigrated as Rowaine, the villainess who was executed for abusing a werebeast. In order to escape death, I decided to replace my sister Linier in her arranged marriage.

The problem is that Duke Blois, the groom, is a cat werebeast who is known as a bloodthirsty battlefield monster…

“My dear, I heard your hobbies include abusing werebeasts like myself.”

“I haven’t heard of such a condition stating that women who abused werebeasts could not be Your Grace’s wife, though.”

His emerald eyes flashed dangerously at me, I quickly kept speaking before he could say anything.

“If my hobby is a problem, then I promise that I will never abuse you, Your Grace.”

“Ha– what?”

This is the story of a ten-year contractual marriage between a cat lover and a prickly cat werebeast.

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

altTitles.ja: はめつのおうこく

description.en: Due to the Gear Expansion, witches who had been friends with the people become unnecessary. Humans, who were afraid of unscientific power, begin a witch hunt… And a human boy who has his beloved witch killed becomes the “Wizard of vengeance”.
description.pt-br: Devido à Expansão da Tecnologia, as bruxas que eram amigas do povo se tornaram desnecessárias. Humanos, que temiam o poder não científico, começam uma caça às bruxas… E um menino humano que teve sua amada bruxa morta, se torna o “Mago da Vingança”.

altTitles.ja: 王宮のトリニティ

description.en:
This story takes place in Wardell Ceram, a country of flowers and trees. Luka and Sylvan, the "Wolf Claws", act as chivalrous thieves who steal from evil aristocrats. One day, the princess of the kingdom asks them to help her crack down on corrupt nobles.   
  
A thief x princess love comedy unfolds!

title.en: N Methods to Make the Scum Gameover

altTitles.zh-ro: Zha Nan Gameover De N Zhong Fang Fa

altTitles.vi: Tôi Ở Di Giới Khai Ngư Đường
N Cách Để Khiến Tra Nam Gameover

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhā Nán Gameover De N Zhǒng Fāng Fǎ

description.en: I fell from a building strangely when I appeared? Am I dead or alive after falling from the 18th floor? Suddenly an NPC wanted to play a game with me? I quickly traveled to various novels, met a lot of handsome men, activated the cheat code to kill all the scum, and completed the mission in the other world to come back to life? Wait a minute! Why am I in hard mode when I first arrive? !

altTitles.ja: アオアシ

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

title.en: Stepping on the Scumbag to Be the Master of Gods

description.en: Others bind the system to quickly travel through levels and fight the BOSS. When it comes to Li Anan, she is the BOSS! The scumbag is in a high position? Li Anan directly crushes him: "Kneel down!" The bitch is deeply scheming? Li Anan taunted at full level: "Just This?" Holding the Lord God System in hand, Li Anan blocks the killing gods all the way, kills the scumbag men and tortures the scumbag girls, and saves the love brain. He is bound to fight back to the world terminal and regain the Godhead of the Creator God! With this one, he will be the only one in the world!

title.en: Shin Mazinger Zero vs Ankoku Daishougun

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin Mazinger Zero vs. Ankoku Daishogun

altTitles.en: Shin Mazinger Zero vs. Great General of Darkness

altTitles.ja: 真マジンガーZEROvs暗黒大将軍

altTitles.zh: 真魔神ZERO VS 暗黑大将军

description.en: After finally defeating Dr. Hell, Kabuto Kouji has to battle the forces of the Mikene Empire. Against an enemy unknown even to Minerva X, who has seen countless alternate timelines, Mazinger Z faces his most desperate moments! (MAL)
description.pt-br: Depois de finalmente derrotar o Dr. Hell, Kabuto Kouji tem que lutar contra as forças do Império Mikene. Contra um inimigo desconhecido até mesmo para Minerva X, que viu inúmeras linhas do tempo alternativas, Mazinger Z enfrenta seus momentos mais desesperadores!

altTitles.en: I Am Going to Be a Bastard
I Want to Be a Scoundrel
I'm Going to Be a Great Villain
I Want to Be a Big Baddie

description.en:
A proper villain must be ruthless and evil, a bringer of death! Having tormented the protagonist to his heart's content, he makes a brilliant exit. Once he's finished his work, he goes out with a bang.
Wang Yi was determined to be that kind of villain. Unfortunately… His male lead can read minds. (:з)∠*)
“You mongrel!” Mr. Yi chuckled as he looked down on the novel’s male lead.
Suddenly, a thought bubble filled with cute emojis (⁄ ⁄ ⁄ω⁄ ⁄ ⁄) and the words “You’re so cute…” appeared in front of Qin.
Qin: ?

title.en: Saikyou no Kurokishi♂, Sentou Maid♀ ni Tenshoku shimashita

altTitles.en: From The Strongest Dark Knight ♂, Changed Job Into Combat Maid ♀

altTitles.ja: 最強の黒騎士♂、戦闘メイド♀に転職しました

description.en:
Albright, who was famous as “the strongest Black Knight”, was reincarnated as a girl, Maria, whose ribbon suited her well for same reason. Maria, 16 years old, is currently a maid in the Marquess of Urband family in attendance to the Daughter of the Marquees, Relena. After Relena became engaged to the 4th Prince, the area around Maria had gotten busier…  
  

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0141ec/) (Raw)
description.ja: 16歳のマリアはアーバンド候爵家で侯爵令嬢リリーナに仕えていた。メイドとしての仕事をこなしながらも、”鼠退治””害虫駆除”と称して侯爵家の人々を狙う暗殺者たちとの戦闘をくり返すマリアと使用人たち。そんなマリアの前世は【最強の黒騎士】と謳われた男・オブライトだった…!!
description.pt-br: Albright, que era famoso como "o Cavaleiro Negro mais forte", reencarnou como uma menina, Maria, cuja fita se adequava bem a ela pela mesma razão. Maria, 16 anos de idade, é atualmente uma empregada doméstica do Marquês da família urbana na assistência à filha dos Marqueses, Relena. Depois que Relena ficou noiva do 4º príncipe, a área em torno de Maria ficou mais ocupada…

altTitles.ja: 大室家

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

altTitles.ja: ブルーロック-EPISODE 凪-

description.en: Nagi Seishiro is a second-year high school student. He is a boy whose habit is to say, "It's a pain in the ass," and he lives his life listlessly. Until his partner, Mikage Reo, discovers his talent in the "Blue Lock," a dormitory for training strikers that aims to win the World Cup for Japanese soccer.
description.fr: Nagi Seishiro est un lycéen de deuxième année. C'est un adolescent qui a l'habitude de tout le temps dire : « C'est chiant », il vit sa vie avec apathie. Jusqu'à ce que son camarade de classe, Mikage Reo, découvre son talent pour le foot, cela les mènera jusqu'au « Blue Lock », un centre de formation révolutionnaire rassemblant les 300 meilleurs attaquants lycéens du pays.
description.pt-br: Nagi Seishiro é um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio. Ele é um garoto cujo hábito é dizer: "Que saco", e ele vive sua vida com indiferença. Até que seu parceiro, Mikage Reo, descobre seu talento em "Blue Lock", um dormitório para treinamento de atacantes que visa vencer a Copa do Mundo em nome do futebol japonês.

title.en: Kao ni denai Kashiwada-san to Kao ni deru Ota-kun

altTitles.ja: 顔に出ない柏田さんと顔に出る太田君

altTitles.ko: 얼굴에 드러나지 않는 카시와다 양과 얼굴에 드러나는 오오타 군

altTitles.pt-br: A inexpressiva Kashiwada-san e o emotivo Oota-kun

description.en:
Meet Kashiwada-san, a female middle-school student, who remains emotionless regardless of how she is meddled with.  
And Oota-kun, unable to control his facial expressions, is the complete opposite of Kashiwada-san–but he keeps messing with her, against his better judgment?!  
Though the two of them are the exact opposite, will a mutual love eventually develop between them…?  
 

---

**Links:**  
- [Official Korean Translation](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/zktldhkek)
description.pt: Conheça Kashiwada-san, uma estudante do ensino médio, que permanece sem expressões, independentemente do que ela está sentindo. E Oota-kun, incapaz de controlar suas expressões faciais, é o completo oposto de Kashiwada-san, mas ele continua mexendo com ela, será que ele vai chegar a algum lugar? Embora ambos sejam exatamente o oposto, um amor mútuo acabará se desenvolvendo entre eles …?
description.pt-br: Conheça Kashiwada-san, uma estudante do ensino médio, que permanece sem expressões, independentemente do que ela está sentindo. E Oota-kun, incapaz de controlar suas expressões faciais, é o completo oposto de Kashiwada-san, mas ele continua mexendo com ela, será que ele vai chegar a algum lugar? Embora ambos sejam exatamente o oposto, um amor mútuo acabará se desenvolvendo entre eles ...?

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents to Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.es-la: El regaño que nunca quisieras recibir de tus padres
La charla que nunca quieres que te den tus padres.

title.en: Blue Archive - Kinkyuu Kaigi: Yuuka-chan no Pantsu ga Nakunatta Ken (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 緊急会議ユウカちゃんのパンツがなくなった件 (ブルーアーカイブ)

altTitles.ja-ro: Kinkyuu Kaigi Yuuka-chan no Pantsu ga Nakunatta Ken (Blue Archive)

altTitles.en: Emergency Meeting: A Story About Yuuka's Missing Panties (Blue Archive)

title.en: S Rank Boukensha de aru Ore no Musume-tachi wa Juudo no Father Con deshita

altTitles.en: My Daughters, S-Rank Adventurers, Have a Severe Obsession With Their Father

altTitles.ja: Sランク冒険者である俺の娘たちは重度のファザコンでした

altTitles.ru: Мои дочери, которые являются искателями приключений S-ранга, очень сильно увлеклись

altTitles.zh: 身为S级冒险者的我，女儿却是重度父控

description.en: The youngest A-rank adventurer, child prodigy Kaiser, finds three babies who were the only survivor of a destroyed village. Then he decided to give up his job as an adventurer and raise them. Over time, the girls grow brightly and show exceptional talents in fencing, magic and management. However, these girls also seem to love their father, Kaiser!
description.ja:
将来を嘱望されていた最年少のＡランク冒険者カイゼルは自分のミスで守るべき村をドラゴンに焼き尽くされてしまう……。絶望の淵に立たされた彼が、焼け野原で見つけたのが村の唯一の生き残りである――３人の赤ん坊だった。希望の光に満ちた赤ん坊を胸に、カイゼルは誓う。

「この子たちは、俺が立派に育て幸せにしてみせる！」

時は経ち、娘たちは彼の尽力の甲斐もあり立派に成長を遂げ、剣技に、経営に、魔法に、稀有な才能を花開かせようとしていた。

だけど、困ったことが1つだけ……。
優秀過ぎる娘たちが父・カイゼルを大好き過ぎて――!?

altTitles.ja: 憂国のモリアーティ-The Remains-

description.en: A manga adaptation of the Yuukoku no Moriarty light novels.

altTitles.ja: 人格FFF級のため魔王討伐やり直しになりました

altTitles.zh-hk: 由於人格FFF級，重新開始了討伐魔王

altTitles.ja-ro: Jinkaku FFF-kyū no Tame Maō Tōbatsu Yarinaoshi ni Narimashita

altTitles.th: ผู้กล้าขยะ คลาส FFF

description.en:
Hansoo Kang was an average boy living in the normal world when he was suddenly summoned to Fantasia, a fantasy world run by demons!

Deemed the Chosen Hero, he’s spent the last ten years building himself up to defeat the lord of Fantasia - which turned out to be a piece of cake.

As he eagerly awaits his return to the real world, the “god” of Fantasia appears and throws a wrench in his plan: a report card that reveals there’s more to being a hero than just might.
description.ja:
史上最悪に性格の悪い勇者が誕生？！ いきなりファンタジー世界に召喚されてから10年間、苦労してやっと魔王を倒した。 ようやく元の世界に戻れると思ったその瞬間、ファンタジー世界の神から通知表を出されるが、 魔王を倒す過程で邪魔になるものは全て殺したせいで人格の評価がFになっていた。 もう一度最初からファンタジー世界の冒険をやり直すことになり… 果たして元の世界には戻れるのか？

---
**Links:**
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/33711)
description.ko:
주인공 강한수는 판타지아 세계로 소환된 뒤 
10년의 고생 끝에 마왕을 쓰러뜨린다.

이제 원래 세계로 돌아가는 건가, 행복해 하는 찰나. 
판타지 세계의 신으로부터 성적표가 날아온다.

마왕 살해에 방해되는 요소를 모조리 치워가면서 왔더니 
인성 점수가 F로 나와버렸다!

이어지는 회귀, 판타지 세계의 모험을 
처음부터 다시 시작해야 한다.

과연 강한수는 무한한 회귀를 끝낼 수 있을까.
description.ru: Когда ценой жизни своих товарищей герой добрался до замка Владыки Демонов и одолел его хозяина, ему нужно было только одно – возвращение на землю. Весь этот мир и люди, его населяющие, не стоили для парня ни гроша. Однако, вместо того, чтобы вернуться обратно домой, он получил ранг F за всё, что натворил. Ублюдку F-ранга придется начать все заново!
description.pt-br: O protagonista Kang Han Soo matou o rei demônio Dez anos após ter sido invocado no reino de fantasia. Agora é hora de ser mandado de volta para a Terra. O que é isso? O deus do mundo de fantasia apareceu com o seu boletim. Por ter removido todos os obstáculos que o impediam de matar o rei demônio, sua pontuação de personalidade foi F. O retrocesso que segue é que ele deve retornar ao começo e começar tudo de novo. Kang Han Soo conseguirá acabar com esses retornos sem fim?

altTitles.ja: しかのこのこのここしたんたん

description.en:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?

Trivia:
- The author is the illustrator/'mama' for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata (天音かなた)](https://www.youtube.com/@AmaneKanata). Because of this, physical copies on Amazon sold out within a day.
description.ja: 出会いはある朝、彼女のツノが電線に引っかかっていたから………!?うっかり変なツノの生えた女の子を助けたことで優等生（の皮を被った）虎視虎子の人生が大混乱に!?一人の少女（元ヤン）が一人のシカ（？）に出会うガール・ミーツ・シカ物語（コメディ）開幕!!

title.en: Death March kara Hajimaru Isekai Kyousoukyoku

altTitles.en: Death March to the Parallel World Rhapsody
Death Marching to the Parallel World Rhapsody

altTitles.ru: Марш смерти в рапсодию параллельного мирa

altTitles.th: โศกนาฏกรรมต่างโลกเริ่มต้นจากเดธมาร์ช

altTitles.ja: デスマーチからはじまる異世界狂想曲

altTitles.zh: 从死亡之旅开始的异世界狂想曲

description.en: 29-year-old programmer Suzuki Ichirou finds himself transported into a fantasy RPG. Within the game, he's a 15-year-old named Satou. At first he thinks he's dreaming, but his experiences seem very real. Due to his use of a 3-time-use special power (meteor shower), he ends up wiping out an army of lizardmen and becoming very high level. He hides his level and plans to live peacefully and meet new people, though developments in the game story (like the return of a demon king) might get in his way.
description.pt-br: Suzuki Ichirou é um programado de 29 anos que subitamente fora levado a um mundo diferente, trajando apenas roupas comum e no level 1. Ele obteve um nível elevado e inúmeros tesouros após utilizar 3 vezes uma habilidade descartável, [Meteor Shower], chuva de meteoros. Após superar essa crise, ele decidiu realizar um "Turismo em outro mundo? Superando adversidades, fazendo amigos, obtendo companheiros, ocasionalmente derrotando demônios, lordes demônios e pessoas mal-intencionadas, Satou aproveita o seu dia-a-dia nesta calorosa história de fantasia.

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ni Nattara Suki na Hito ni Hirowareta

altTitles.ja: 犬になったら好きな人に拾われた。

altTitles.pt-br: Minha Vida como o Cachorrinho da Inukai-san

altTitles.zh: 无意间变成狗，被喜欢的女生捡回家。

altTitles.zh-hk: 變成狗後被喜歡的人撿回家。

description.en:
A little ecchi comedy where you are being kept by a cool, beautiful girl! When you woke up, you found yourself as the pet dog of a girl named Inukai-san! At school, Inukai-san has no expression on her face, but she's a dog lover who loves her dog to pieces! She loves dogs so much that she's going to turn you into a real dog, body and soul! An erotic comedy that makes you stop being human!  
 
- [Manga Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/inuninattara)
description.pt-br:
Uma pequena comédia ecchi onde você está sendo cuidado por uma garota legal e bonita! 

Quando você acordou, você se viu como o cachorro de estimação de uma garota chamada Inukai-san! Na escola, Inukai-san não tem nenhuma expressão no rosto, mas ela adora cachorros! Ela ama tanto cachorros que vai transformar você em um cão, de corpo e alma! 

Uma comédia erótica que faz você querer deixar de ser humano!

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

altTitles.ja-ro: Toaru Majutsu no Index Gaiden: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun

altTitles.es: Un cierto cañón de riel científico

altTitles.th: เรลกัน แฟ้มลับคดีวิทยาศาสตร์

altTitles.ja: とある科学の超電磁砲
とある魔術の禁書目録外伝 とある科学の超電磁砲

description.en:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
description.ru:
Где-то на островах Южной Японии раскинулся Академия Сити - город, большинство жителей которого учатся и работают в школах юных эсперов. Обладатели паранормальных способностей в поте лица трудятся, чтобы познать свой дар и поднять владение им на новую высоту. Гордость школы Токивадай и всего города? Мисака Микото – третья по силе среди известных миру эсперов высшего уровня. У «Электрической принцессы» много полезных умений, одно из которых – ручной рейлган, то есть возможность своими электромагнитными способностями разогнать монетку где-то до трех Махов (на другом конце траектории стоять не рекомендуется). Но всех усилий Микото пока не хватает для решения двух насущных задач: отбиться от юрийных домогательств своей подруги Сирай Куроко и разобраться с наглым парнем по имени Камидзё Тома!


---

altTitles.ja: アラバスターの季節

description.en: Maeda Gin is a student who enjoys drawing graffitis at an abandoned apartment complex building near his school, with his friends and acolytes, Teppei and Kon-chan. One night, while they're at work on one of their masterpieces, they're interrupted by a mysterious ghastly pale-skinned woman who scares them. In the process of fleeing, Gin loses his sketchbook to her and then from this point onwards, his life will change in a major way! Some nude painting with his beautiful and attractive art teacher? Welcome to Season of Alabaster.
description.pt-br: Maeda Gin é um estudante que gosta de desenhar graffitis em um prédio abandonado perto de sua escola, com seus amigos e acólitos, Teppei e Kon-chan. Uma noite, enquanto eles estão trabalhando em uma de suas obras-primas, eles são interrompidos por uma misteriosa mulher de pele pálida que os assusta. No processo de fuga, Gin perde seu caderno de desenho para ela e, a partir deste ponto, sua vida muda radicalmente! Alguma pintura nua com sua bela e atraente professora de arte? Bem-vindo à Temporada de Alabastro.

title.en: Kimi wa Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi o!

altTitles.ja: 君は喧し閉じてよ口を！

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ha Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi wo!

altTitles.en: You're Too Noisy, So Just Shut It Already!
You Talk Too Much, So Just Shut It Already!

altTitles.vi: Cậu Ồn Ào Quá, Im lặng Giùm Tớ Đi!

altTitles.ru: Ты слишком много говоришь, так что заткнись уже!

altTitles.tl: Ang Ingay Mo Kaya Manahimik Ka Na Lang!

description.en: Hīragi Tsukino was born deaf. When she transfers to a new school, she meets a talkative boy named Enomoto Taiyō. Tsukino is slightly taken aback by Taiyō, who talks to her without regard to the fact that she can't hear.
description.ja: 柊月乃は生まれつき耳が聞こえない。そんな彼女が転校先で出会ったのは、おしゃべりな男子・榎本太陽。聞こえないことなんかお構いなしにしゃべりかけてくる太陽に若干引き気味な月乃。
description.ru: Хиираги Цукино родилась глухой. Когда она переводится в новую школу, она встречает говорливого мальчика по имени Эномото Тайо. Цукино немного обескуражена тем, что Тайо разговаривает с ней, не заботясь о том, что она не может его слышать...
description.vi: Hiiragi Tsukino là một cô bạn bị khiếm thính bẩm sinh. Khi cậu ấy chuyển đến trường mới, cậu ấy gặp được một cậu bạn lắm mồm tên Enomoto Taiyo. Tại đây, Tsukino luôn bị xoay tròn bởi những câu chuyện xàm xí của Taiyo bất chấp việc cô không thể nghe được cậu ta nói gì.

altTitles.ja: ルナティックサーカス

description.en: "Lunatic Circus" is a story about the circus called "Lunatic Circus", which is said to be the best in post WWII Japan, which has achieved an incredibly rapid economic growth. The star of the circus, Ryunosuke, and all the other trapeze artists, are the protagonists of this manga. This is the story of their dreams, their fears, their struggles and their hopes.
